name: Bad Dream: Fever
description: The world is covered in strange ink, an unknown plague has gathered its cruel harvest. The city seems to be completely empty and dead, but in its every corner there are manifestations of fear, sorrow, loneliness and suffering.
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Windows XP, Vista, 7/8/10 處理器: 2 GHz 記憶體: 1 GB 記憶體 儲存空間: 500 MB 可用空間
